item.description:
See the LP Mass. website for details, This is the annual LPMA State Convention, where we elect the State Committee, act on various Bylaw and Constitutional Ammendments, make changes to the party platform and do other related business.

Note that while all can attend, you MUST be a current member of the LPMA, or have been a member within the last year and renew if you wish to vote.

Admission is $30 / person, payable at the door, and includes a buffet lunch.

The convention will run from 10:00 AM (SHARP) and must end at 2:00 PM due to loss of space.

(I should have posted this sooner...)

ART
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for LP convention in meeting room
item.name: LPMA Annual State Convention
